FuncDef:
The access statistics vpn-instance enable command enables VPN instance-based user traffic statistics collection on a BAS interface.
The undo access statistics vpn-instance enable command disables VPN instance-based user traffic statistics collection on a BAS interface.
By default, VPN instance-based user traffic statistics collection is disabled on BAS interfaces.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If multiple users bound to VPN instances exist on a BAS interface, you can run the access statistics vpn-instance enable command to enable VPN instance-based user traffic statistics collection on the BAS interface.
Prerequisites
An access type has been configured for the BAS interface using the access-type command.
